location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to David Seton, Resident at Muscat

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from significant amounts of pest damage, which has obscured the date, leaving ...807. The address of the letter has also been partially obscured, however it is still possible to identify the intended recipient.

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident at Muscat that Nicholas Hankey Smith has intelligence concerning a French package bound for the Isle of France [Mauritius], which he intends to intercept.The date and content of the subsequent letter (see f 17v 1) suggests that the date of this letter is the 20 July 1807.
